section.name: The Seam Telco Framework (STF)
section.p:
On top of Seam, Sip Servlets and MSC API (Media Server), we have built another framework that allows you to handle SIP and Media events in your Seam components. The STF application are extremely lean and simple to code. There are a number of other advantages to using Seam - easier to mix Web and SIP and Media applications, hot deployment with JBoss Tools, unified component model for Web and Telco application. Click here to read the complete documentation of The Seam Telco Framework.
There are a number of examples you can see in the documenation. We are also building our Mobicents IPBX on top of it.

section.name: Using JBoss Seam as a Web Framework without STF
section.p: JBoss Seam is a great Web Framework to use for the GUI of your Telco Applications. Seam comes with many AJAX-enabled components like A4J and Richfaces, it also has a great integration with there enterprise middleware features in JBoss. Mobicents Sip Servlets has been tested with Seam and we have two example application that can help you get started - Shopping Demo and Mobicents IPBX
